typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.Medication
typeDescription.description: The actual medication containing the concept and additional information.

featureDescription.name: drug
featureDescription.description: Drug or multi drug of the actual medication.

featureDescription.name: dosage
featureDescription.description: Dosage information of the actual medication.

featureDescription.name: doseForm
featureDescription.description: Dose form of the actual medication.

featureDescription.name: doseFrequency
featureDescription.description: Dose frequency of the actual medication. Could be AbstractDoseFrequency or DailyDoseFrequency, WeeklyDoseFrequency etc.

featureDescription.name: date
featureDescription.description: Temporal information about the actual medication.

featureDescription.name: administrations
featureDescription.description: The routes of administration of this medication.

featureDescription.name: additionalAmounts
featureDescription.description: Additional mentions of dose amounts, e.g., 2 doses.

featureDescription.name: status
featureDescription.description: Status of the medication, e.g. NEGATED, CONSIDERED. For all available value see MedicationStatus.

featureDescription.name: category
featureDescription.description: Category of the medication, e.g. ADMISSION, DISCHARGE. For all available value see MedicationCategory.

featureDescription.name: termTypes
featureDescription.description: Additional information on clinical drug, e.g. semantic clinical drug (RxNorm Term Type).

featureDescription.name: atcCodes
featureDescription.description: The ATC Codes of the medication.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.Dosage
typeDescription.description: Dosage information.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.AbstractDrug
typeDescription.description: Supertype of the drugs.

featureDescription.name: brandName
featureDescription.description: The brand name of the drug.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.Drug
typeDescription.description: Drug with only one ingredient.

featureDescription.name: ingredient
featureDescription.description: The ingredient concept of the actual drug.

featureDescription.name: strength
featureDescription.description: Strength of the drug

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.MultiDrug
typeDescription.description: Drug with more than one ingredient.

featureDescription.name: drugs
featureDescription.description: List of all drugs contained in the actual multi drug

featureDescription.name: concept
featureDescription.description: The original ingredient concept responsible for the multi drug.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.Strength
typeDescription.description: The strength of a drug concerning a medication.

featureDescription.name: concept
featureDescription.description: An optional concept describing the strength.

featureDescription.name: measurement
featureDescription.description: The actual strength as a measurement

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.ATCCodeConcept
typeDescription.description: Concept type for atc codes.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.IngredientConcept
typeDescription.description: Concept type for ingredients.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.DoseFormConcept
typeDescription.description: Concept type for dose forms.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.StrengthConcept
typeDescription.description: Concept type for strengths.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.DoseFrequency
typeDescription.description: Supertype of the dose frequencies.

featureDescription.name: interval
featureDescription.description: The taking interval of a medication, e.g. day, week, month etc.

featureDescription.name: totalCount
featureDescription.description: Total count of taken drug units per interval.

featureDescription.name: totalDose
featureDescription.description: Total dose of taken drug per interval.

featureDescription.name: regimen
featureDescription.description: Annotation of the mentioned regimen, e.g. 'three times daily'

featureDescription.name: concept
featureDescription.description: Optional concept that was the origin of the dose frequency.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.DoseFrequencyConcept
typeDescription.description: Concept type for dose frequencies.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.DayTimeDoseFrequency
typeDescription.description: Details of dose frequency for a specific time of day.

featureDescription.name: morning
featureDescription.description: Number of drug units in the morning.

featureDescription.name: midday
featureDescription.description: Number of drug units at midday.

featureDescription.name: evening
featureDescription.description: Number of drug units in the evening.

featureDescription.name: atNight
featureDescription.description: Number of drug units at night or bedtime.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.TimeMeasurementDoseFrequency
typeDescription.description: Details of dose frequency with interval given by a time measurement like daily or each two weeks.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.WeekDayDoseFrequency
typeDescription.description: Details of dose frequency for a specific weekday.

featureDescription.name: monday
featureDescription.description: Number of drug units on monday.

featureDescription.name: tuesday
featureDescription.description: Number of drug units on tuesday.

featureDescription.name: wednesday
featureDescription.description: Number of drug units on wednesday.

featureDescription.name: thursday
featureDescription.description: Number of drug units on thursday.

featureDescription.name: friday
featureDescription.description: Number of drug units on friday.

featureDescription.name: saturday
featureDescription.description: Number of drug units on saturday.

featureDescription.name: sunday
featureDescription.description: Number of drug units on sunday.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.Administration
typeDescription.description: Textspan specifying a route of administration.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.AdditionalDoseAmount
typeDescription.description: Textspan specifying additional information of the dose amount.

featureDescription.name: value
featureDescription.description: The numeric value describing the additional amount.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.TTY
typeDescription.description: RxNorm Term Type

featureDescription.name: kind
featureDescription.description: Kind of term type, e.g. SCD.

featureDescription.name: code
featureDescription.description: Term type code for actual medication.

featureDescription.name: description
featureDescription.description: Term type description for actual medication.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.AdditionalDoseAmountIndicator
typeDescription.description: Indicator for following additional dose amount.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.MedicationIgnore
typeDescription.description: Abstract super type for text spans that should be ignored when building the medication relation.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.MedicationIgnorePhrase
typeDescription.description: Text spans based on dictionaries or patterns that should be ignored when building the medication relation.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.MedicationIgnoreEntity
typeDescription.description: Text spans based on a given annotation that should be ignored when building the medication relation.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.NoMedication
typeDescription.description: An indicator annotation specifying that this span is no part of a medication.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.NoMedicationContext
typeDescription.description: An indicator annotation specifying that a nearby span is no part of a medication.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.NoMedicationContextBlocker
typeDescription.description: An indicator annotation specifying that a nearby context is applicable for changing the semantic of the medication.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.MedicationContext
typeDescription.description: An indicator annotation specifying that a nearby span is part of a medication.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.MedicationStatus
typeDescription.description: Status of the medication. Available values: null, NEGATED, CONSIDERED, INTENDED, INACTIVE, UNKNOWN.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.MedicationCategory
typeDescription.description: Category of the medication. Available values: null, ADMISSION, ALLERGY, INPATIENT, DISCHARGE, FAMILY, CONDITIONING_TREATMENT.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.MedicationStatusIndicator
typeDescription.description: Indicator for a status of a medication. Interpretation could be e.g. NEGATED, CONSIDERED. For all available value see MedicationStatus.
